name: Scribb Rotation
description:
It's suppose to be kind of "rage game", so it's gonna be bit hard and frustrating.

Have fun!

My first game jam ever,

Gonna add the other features and mobile version in the future.

Around ~16 hours of work.

HOW TO PLAY:

- Click or Space to jump

- Reach the flag on top and win

- Tap the return button (bottom right) to go back checkpoint.

Music:

8Bit Music Album - 051321 by GWriterStudio
